description:
While struggling against Shoushou, Houhou recalls Niken`s words and begins her counterattack.
Ouya and Shokatsu Sei`s match is next. Shokatsu Sei has realized Ouya is a fangshi and Qimen Dunjia user like himself.
During their match, Ouya encourages Shokatsu Sei to stop fighting and admit defeat, but...
Source: crunchyroll
